introduction: The Challenge of Rudolf Steiner, filmed during 2011 - the 150th anniversary year of Steiner's birth - tells the story of his remarkable life, interwoven with contemporary examples of how his ideas and insights have influenced piorneering work all over the world in education, agriculture, medicine, finance and the arts.Filmed on location in Austria, Switzerland, the USA, India and in the UK, the documentary explores how the work of this Austrian philosopher, educationalist and visionary has grown in both relevance and urgency since his death in 1925.
